price: 49. Notifica a Mis siervos (¡oh, Muhammad!) que Yo soy el Indulgente, el Misericordioso.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
